review_data.content:
Never had something bad there, always great.
Really enjoyed their Burger collection and will always try a new one!

All Reviews are written on a personal experience… I usually visit the location multiple times before reviewing to get the best notion to write my review. I try to keep the review as objective as possible, and for the ones under 3 Stars with a constructive thought to improve.
It looks forced fancy and cool. But the whole thing is as real as the plants in this location: artificial. The food (burger) was okay and the staff was very friendly.

I would like to say this place is amazing. Definitely try the cheese and bacon burger. Beer it’s great and thanks to my server (Ergon) and great service I went from a okay choice to a great choice. Definitely would come back.

Good burger. The patty wasn't as hot as I like it but the taste was good. Coleslaw must be sth swiss specific, but it was practically a salad with vinegar. Fries were just awesome. Its a good place and is worth to visit if you are hungry but nothing culinary.
Nice atmosphere with outdoor seating. Burger was OK, they could work a bit more on the fries. Friendly service. Overall good value for money (for Zürich standards).
The fries are excellent!! Poutine was on the small side. My burger didn't impressed me as much as I was hoping for. Service was also excellent, really nice and patient waiter.

The butcher never disappointed me so far. This is a fantastic burger restaurant with delicious burgers. There is a huge variety of burgers and even for vegan people there are tasty versions of burgers.

This place is the right place to be for every burger fans.
The meat is very juicy and very well taken care of from the chefs

I can also recommend the ice Asia fusion.

I hope they bring back the all you can eat offer soon. :) is
Nice outside area to enjoy the sun. Absolutely good Hamburger, maybe one of the best in Zurich. But I didn't like the fries: too greecy.

Biked there with my 10 year old son.10 km on the bike made him quite hungry :) . Wasn't too crowded - there were enough tables outside. The menu card is quite good - everything (incl. drinks) fits on  2 sides of a single page. Easy to pick what you want. We ordered cheesburger and spicy burger. We didn't have to wait too long.
The burgers were actually good - the buns were crispy and fresh, the patties were juicy and there was enough sauce and greens in it. They also tasted good. The spicy had just a bit too much jalapenios (or maybe it wasn't spread equally over the burger).
Definitely will come back soon (maybe in the city centre), to check the goat cheese burger.

This is a photo of the Spicy Burger, costing around 16 CHF. What a joke! McDonalds looks more appetising and has more toppings. Even their most expensive burgers are disappointing as they lack proper toppings. The bread is overpowering in taste and amount. Otherwise it tastes okay. But does severely lack even the most basic toppings in any of their burgers (some 'premium' burgers have toppings that you would expect in even the most basic burger).
In all, these burgers are very badly balanced in terms of bread (too much, too intense) and toppings (quasi non-existent as seen in the photos).
The burger tastes good, but I have had much better burgers (at different restaurants).
Tasty burgers, good fried, friendly service, the price is okay, for my taste the burger could be a bit bigger

Good place, good 👍🏻 burgers, nice atmosphere, excellent service!
Thank you Anna, who works at Heinrichstrasse 239.
Will definitely come again!
Both the burgers were pretty good and had a fair price. The fries didn't look fresh, were a bit cold and hard. The staff was friendly.

Somewhat gloomy atmosphere, you feel like in the cellar. The chairs are rather uncomfortable and do not invite you to linger. The burger, however, is beyond all doubt, the beer is also nice. All in all worth a recommendation, if you know what you get.

Awesome place, great food. I ate a salad with avocado, which was very well seasoned, and some french fries, which were a tad salty for my taste, but either way great. The waitress that took our order was very nice. What i like about this place a lot is the fact that the women’s bathroom had hair spray, deo etc and even women’s sanitary items. Awesome!

We came here on a whim and loved the interior decor and style of the restaurant. Service was quick and efficient, could have been more friendly though and a smile wouldn’t hurt anyone. We had the burgers with nachos. Burgers were of great quality, clearly very fresh and the meat was excellent. Nachos were okay and the guacamole was just disappointing. Portion sizes aren’t huge and could have been bigger considering prize. Probably wouldn’t come again even though burgers were awesome!

I don't think they understand the concept of a pulled-pork sandwich. I tried one and it was more like a mishmash-of-pork sandwich, like it had been through a mixer, plus squishy and slippery so it couldn't stay in the bun and I had to eat it with a fork. Very expensive regarding the low quality, plus you have to pay extra for your sides.

Burgers are great, fries not so much...
The service was friendly, the menu has some nice choices for burgers and salad; it's an all around nice place to have dinner before a movie.
On our second visit we took a salad with the burger and that was just great. The beers are worth mentioning as well, they serve Chopfab draft and the bottled specials.
Best cheese burger I've ever had. I love it so much!

I like the variation of different burgers and the interior design of the restaurant. However the prices are to high especially the extras like bacon or cheese, the burgers are fine but not great, fries portion are small. On top of that you have to order and get your food at the counter. I think there is table service at dinner time
Love how many burger options they have (including interesting veggie and vegan choices). Halloumi fries are also amazing. Good ambience and nice staff too

The burgers were very delicious. Unfortunately that was the only thing above average. Sides were quite small and not that good.
Staff wasn‘t unfriendly... Value for money wasn’t good, considering the tiny menue.
Would not go again.

Nice burgers for a nice price. The environment is very cosy and fits to the restaurants image. We ate dinner without reservation and it was no problem. What we really enjoyed is that they serve types of beer that you normally wouldnt get.

Good food but they got the orders wrong a few times and weren't so responsive. Their spicy sauce is a must if you like spicy-hot. Good veg/vegan/gluten free options. Outdoor seating area is really nice on a sunny day.
We went to buy and take home. They make you wait unnecessarily for being attended. One of the burger's bun was all burned and the patty of the other one was raw. I do not recommend to go.
Very bad customer service. Rude and impolite person was serving us. Dont recommend it! Many time the fries was awful and one time the avocado in burger was missed! Disappointed!
The food was great! However, the table design meant there was a bunch of old food in the cracks. Also they have the heaviest cast iron stools in the history of stools. Super hard to move around!
This place is excellent. A true burger and fries experience with a real twist of flavor and choices.  I had the deer burger fixed their way and it was incredible.  I highly recommend!
It was not the best burger that I had. Don’t get me wrong, it was not awful but nothing extra ordinary. Given that I’m a burger lover with so many burger experience you get what I mean :)

Good burgers, very good fries, and with a lot of vegetarian options (well, more than usual at least). However service was slow when we went, we waited 1h for our food and we had some trouble getting someone to bring us the bill.

The relatively new burger chain has also locations in Niederdorf and Zurich West. The chain offers very good burgers at a reasonable price.
Definitely try the fries as well!
Regarding the location, I like the open industrial feel of it.

Went there for lunch.
Love the place.
Food is great.
The meal was filling and decent but not oversized.
The fries are good as well as the overall price.
I will go there again for sure
Solid burger with good variety, options to up-size and cooked perfectly. The sides could use more work, fries are unspectacular and the salad's defining characteristic is being drenched in sauce.
Tasty, nyammie! Price is really good and it is a great burger. They also have pulled pork sandwich and many others. I think it is a must to try...

Best burgers in Zurich West. We went before catching a movie at Abaton and so did many others — the place was packed. We ended up waiting in line for 30 minutes before we could order. The burgers came out after another wait, so we only had 15-20 minutes left before the movie.

The fries were great with lots of spices. The bacon cheese burger was okay. Definitely better than Studer, and the other places nearby, but not quite at the level of Helvti Diner or Holy Cows. It looked a bit rushed, which is no wonder with the amount of people they were serving. It was somewhat small which worked okay since we were late for the movie.

The place has a great atmosphere and I look forward to coming back on a more quiet night. The decoration is super with low lights and a rustic look. It looks like a place that would serve cocktails, but they only have soda and beer.

Extremely bad service and rude. We arrived and no one talked to us for at least 10minutes- despite not being the most busiest ever, just would not look at us. Finally we sat down, after a short while the waitress told us that because they were one less person in the kitchen, they would close earlier and thus wouldn't serve us. Even though that was 45 minutes before the time that the kitchen was supposed to close. Not only I find completely unprofessional that you decide to just close the place earlier without any notice on a Friday night, but if you do so it would be expected to enunciate it politely and immediately when the customer arrive instead of ignoring him/her.

I work nearby and go once in a while to The Butchers. There is a wide range of burgers. The burger's bread bun is unique and more tasty then anywhere else I've been. The meat is succulent and if you prefer vegetarian burgers, get the yummi Fallafel Burger. Normally the burger suffice for me but when I am beary hungry I order it as a meal. I like the variety of fresh ice teas you can choose from and the pommes you get in the meal as well are perfect crispy. There is as much Ketchup you like or you order one of their amazing sauces.
Burgers were very so-so. Beer absolutely awful, my IPA didn't taste like it, it was some generic brand. Dessert was old, ice creams had pieces of ice water.  Will NOT come back

The food was great, as in the other Butcher places. But after dining in this, all my clothes and my hair got that annoying food/frying smell that you get when a restaurant is not properly ventilated. I had to wash all my clothes after visiting this one, they all stinked badly.
So, I enjoyed the food, but already on the way home I was a bit disappointed.
To cool of an atmosphere to offer a relaxing dinner experience. Food is tasty. Overpriced vegetarian burger. Too loud music and not very helpful staff when asked to lower the volume.

Great burgers!
Super friendly staff and nice vibes
Only problem: extra mayo cost 1.80!
Amazing service, amazing food (order the truffle mayo, it’s worth it). I hardly ever wish I order the large fries, definitely the case here. Very reasonable price. 10/10

The location could use some more personality (it's a chain) and a price-cut (welcome to Zurich, I guess). Otherwise, good portions of tasty food and an interesting selection of high quality meat-sandwiches.

You pay CHF 13 for the basic sandwhich + CHF 5 more for small fries + CHF [some more] for smth to drink.

This is all "in my opinion" of course - check it out and see for yourself :)

I went to their restaurant near Abaton. I would like to officially nominate The Butcher for the worst french fries in the universe award. Soggy. Very salty. Drenched in sodiumglutamate. I have a hard time understanding what goes through people's heads when they decide to sprinkle fries with such poorly chosen spices as if they were throwing confetti on fat tuesday. I honestly have to gag every time I think about those fries. Then there's the "secret cheesemix". Again, the chef must have been smoking some pretty strong stuff to come up with such an abysmal burger topping. The meat is low quality, the bun tastes like cardboard. The side salads are a pathetic waste of 8 francs. I find it hard to recommend this place. Best of Swiss gastro is more like best of Swiss gastroenteritis in this case.
The burgers are tasty but are far too pricey compared to the other very good burger companies in Zürich e.g. the fries is only a small portion but cost 6.80 CHF.
Steak Burger was the toughest piece of meat I've ever eaten. Service was adequate and atmosphere was good. Burger was not worth the experience.
Great burger but sometimes I'm not sure they know how to cook here. Many times the burger is undercooked --raw through much of it.
This place is great. Excellent burgers and fries - I love them. Of course, the service is very nice and helpful.
The decor is simple but nice - i love it! Amazing service, tasty burger & affordable price. Perfect for all  - groups/individuals  :)
Good burgers and decent vegetarian offers. The atmosphere is very cool and hip.i was there for lunch so i can't tell how dinner is but i would assume it's also nice.
Delicious burgers and friendly service.
Great burgers with or without meat, home made ice teas, and a good selection of local beers. Quick friendly service and good value for money!
Super friendly Staff, cool Atmosphere, good music (a little more metal wouldn't hurt anybody ;P )and most importantly a damn delicious burger!
Good selection of veggie burgers, a bit expensive
Amazing. Our „cheat day“ happens always in The Butcher . Great vegi burgers. The superfood one os my fav. Staff is also very friendly :)!
It's an ok burger place. The prices are quite high given the small size of the burgers, and sides are steep, too. Service was alright.
Good place to get some burgers. They're a chain-restaurant. Quality is good and taste also.
Really good quality burgers, with some awesome self made sauces and over all a very good expirience, I'm always very satisfied at the butcher!
Nice ambiente. Delicious fries. But the main thing (The Burger) was only average.
Very good burger quality in spite of the fact that the place looks almost like a fast food. Recommended!
Good all beef burger at a fair price. It's no American burger, but hey, this is Switzerland.
Fancy fast food burger place. Reasonably priced, open on sundays (rare in Zurich). Much nicer food than the kebab places nearby.
Great personnel. We were there just 2 times and they remembered us. Food arrives pretty fast and tastes relatively good.

SHAME ON YOU The Butcher MANAGEMENT! On a Sunday afternoon you have one person in the kitchen and only one waitress and she was in training! I would have given you a star but it is not fair for the people that did great with 30 persons only inside! The food is great but this a is typical way of saving money without caring about customers!
good burgers, it's worth the visit!
Good big burgers. All you can eat option on monday for a fair price but only if you are a big eater.
Pulled pork burger and chips were very nice. Great location near the cinema and billiards hall.

Great burgers and fries near Zürich Hardbrücke.

Staff is very friendly, but food is often served quite slowly.
Food is ok, but they never get my order right! It's something missing or sometime can something entirely different from want was ordered.
The fries are better than the burger (so if the side dish is better than the main dish there is a problem)
Really good burgers but a little bit too small for me. Fries from potatoes and fabulous herbs.
Good burgers. For students there is a special deal for the menu where you save alot of money.
Average food. It arrived late and surprisingly cold, even though the place wasn’t full of people. They were also late bringing the card machine.
Nice food but the haloumi fries portion was way to small for the price. This 8 pieces are not worth it.
The burgers and fries are awesome. But we've found some hair in all of our food
I have been to this place many times and i love their burgers. One of the best places in zurich for burgers.
Love the burgers here. I especially like the fact that they do a 'naked' burger as well.
Excellent potatos chips! Very good burgers. Nice and helpful waitress

Super friendly staff, even they apologized for a very small mistake, the perfect place where to come to scape from unfriendly swiss restaurants.
The food was amazing as well!
Vegetarian burger was mediocre, fries soft and not crispy.
Really delicious burgers but quite the wait to get them.
Here is the order in which I like the burgers in Zürich - Holy Cow Löwenplatz, Butcher Hard
One of the best burgers in Zürich. Casual ambient and a nice selection of drinks.
Great burgers, including vegetarian choices. Very friendly staff.
Love the fries, the menu and the presentation. Lunch service can be a bit slow
Great burgers at affordable price, cool interior and design
Nice Burger, nice Pommes. A little bit expensive but worth the visit
Very good for a quick nice lunch. Amazing burgers, nice beer
Good burgers. I can really recommend the Hayflower Cheese Burger ;-)
One of the best burgers I've ever had.
The Falafel-burger is awesome and as a student you get a decent discount on the lunch menu
Great burgers(the veggie options, too) and chilled atmosphere.
very high price for an average burger, there are many better options in zürich.
The best burger I ever eat so far!
Was there with a friend.  Very chewy meat, you couldn't bite through it ! Not that friendly staff ! Place is cozy
Thy make amazing burgers for a decent price
Amazing burgers, very good prices.
Good burgers with gluten-free buns available
2* are more than fair.
The ambience and the food was excellent. The wait for the food could be definitely inproved.
Really good burgers. Worth trying!
Tasty burgers but avoid the halloumi fries.
Good Burger Place with friendly and attentive staff.
Definitely one of the best burger places in Zurich!
Great Take-Away
Refused to serve at 22.51, when the customer before me in the queue just ordered a BBQ chicken. Blacklisted for unacceptable attitude.
Great burgers - even gluten free and vegi :)
Wasn't impressed! Meat was tough to eat but the bun was good.
Tasty Burgers with gluten free options!
This place is becoming one of my favourite Burger joints.
Great meat on a friendly environment. Recommend to make a booking.
The atmosphere is nice, but the burgers are disappointing.
A pretty good burger option in Hardbrücke area.
The best burger that I have eaten!
Great collaboration of different restaurants
long waiting time but good burgers
Great burgers with incredibly fresh meat.
Great burgers, really bad french fries
Great burgers, nice atmosphere.
Good place to go in small groups up to 10 people
Excellent fries. Mediocre veggie burger.
Good food but horrible service!
Perfect for lunch, prices are a bit steep for dinner.
Very good burgers nice Service
Good Burgers for a fair price
Nice burger place with delicious burgers.
Good selection of different burgers
One of the citys best burger joints.
Decent burgers. Pricey though.
Fresh & tasty burgers!
Great hamburger, maybe the best in zurich
Very good burgers
Ok
Fantastic Monday Night 2 for 1 Burges
Waiting time was terrible and result was average.
It's only average. Worst French Fries
Decent burgers for a price.

Nice burgers
Nice waiters
Absolutely fantastic burgers
Wow, super delicious burger
Very good foot and fast service
Best Burgers in Züri!
Fresh, taste so good !
Great food and good service
Food court style.
Burgers are perfectly cooked
Very good hamburgers!
Pretty good burger
Good food. Good service.
Quality place to be.  Quality menus.
Very nice
Nice combinations with a reasonable pricing
Nice burgers
lit asf
The meatt is f**k good
Food was not so great.
Great!
Tasty burgers.
Fantastic pulled pork
Great burger
good burger
Good deal.
Mega 😋
Perf
Top
Top
Super
Quiet good.
Good place
Amazing place

(Translated by Google) Food very good but for takeaway you have to wait almost 20 minutes while the staff doesn't work really efficiently. I would be happy if this could be improved!

(Original)
Essen sehr gut aber für Takeaway muss man fast 20 min warten, während das Personal nicht wirklich effizient arbeitet. Würde mich freuen wenn dies verbessert werden könnte!!!

(Translated by Google) I ordered a standard hamburger from Uber Eat. I received the order but without bread.
I checked the order afterwards, it said naturism (without a bun)
So half German half English. I can't speak English. (I don't have to either)

My question was:

Why should you order hamburgers without bread? Or why do you charge extra money for hamburger bread?

The boss got in touch but...

(Original)
Ich habe  über Uber Eat ein Normale Hamburger bestehlt. Ich habe die Bestellung erhalten aber ohne Brot.
Habe nacher die Bestellung kontrolliert, hat gestanden FKK ( Ohne Bun)
Also halb deutsch halb english. Ich kann kein Englisch.( Ich muss auch nicht)

Meine Frage war:

Wieso soll mann Hamburger ohne Brot bestellen? Oder wieso verlangt mann für Hamburger Brot extra Geld?

Der Chef hat sich gemeldet aber eben…

(Translated by Google) Delicious and really great serving and payment concept. In addition a fresh location. I will definitely come back

(Original)
Köstlich und richtig tolles Servier- und Bezahlkonzept. Dazu eine freshe Location. Komme sicher wieder

(Translated by Google) Order came quickly, the courier was friendly. The butcher burger was 'ok'. The meat tastes good. Unfortunately almost cold. The fries were cold and soft. The beetroot burger was barely warmer and bland. The salad for 9.80 was tiny, lampy and tasted only like mayonnaise. For almost 60.00, without drinks, an absolute no go! 😫

(Original)
Bestellung kam schnell, der Kurier war freundlich. Der Butcher Burger war 'ok'. Das Fleisch geschmacklich gut. Leider nahezu kalt. Die Pommes waren kalt und weich. Der Beetroot Burger war kaum wärmer und fad. Der Salat für 9.80 war winzig, lampig und schmeckte nur nach Mayonnaise. Für nahezu 60.-, ohne Getränke, ein absolutes No Go! 😫

(Translated by Google) Burger ok but for the price I expect faster service (had to wait 25' in the restaurant, 15' for takeaway). Meat is compressed meat of lower quality..

(Original)
Burger ok aber für den Preis erwarte ich schnelleren Service (musste 25‘ warten im Restaurant, 15‘ für Takeaway). Fleisch ist zusammengepresstes Fleisch von niedrigerer Qualität..

(Translated by Google) Very disappointed, atmosphere and website great, but if you as a customer have to watch the cashier (and service at the same time) as she is almost hyperventilating from the stress and behind it are 4 standing around the burger grill, without ongoing orders and talking about God and the world, you ask who is planning wrong and who is checking and that in the middle of lunchtime. About 30 people were waiting behind me.

Then the customers in front of me still get the answer to their espresso coffee order; Unfortunately, you have to wait, I can't get you a coffee now, when so many people are waiting (the coffee machine is right behind the cash register and the cups too), it gets bizarre. But the absolute highlight was that someone strolled out of the office again, had a leisurely drink, disappeared again and an espresso was only brought to the customer after 15 minutes. Through the office worker. So much for the staff (-ing) and the "friendliness". I already knew I was wrong here. But didn't know how wrong yet.

Because then came the grand finale: My burger looked great, was overpriced, fries were cold and the burger just tasted, sorry, there is no other way, SHIT (Pulled pork cures, is unseasoned and watery, probably because frozen and defrosted / wanted sauce and not found / bun was good / rest tasteless).

Therefore my resumé: Show & Shine, but no performance ......

Oh yes; The fact that you don't have to do the dishes yourself is a miracle with a 25Fr. burger / fries with iced tea.

(Original)
Sehr enttäuscht, Ambiente und Website top, aber wenn man als Kunde der Kassiererin (und gleichzeitig Service) zuschauen muss wie sie vor Stresst fast hyperventiliert und dahinter stehen 4 um den Burgergrill, ohne laufende Bestellungen und unterhalten sich über Gott und die Welt, fragt man sich schon, wer da falsch plant und wer kontrolliert und das mitten in der Mittagszeit. Hinter mir warteten ca 30 Personen.

Dann bekommt die Kunden vor mir noch die Antwort auf ihre Espresso Kaffee Bestellung; du musst leider warten, ich kann dir jetzt nicht einen Kaffee rauslassen, wenn so viele Leute warten (der Kaffeeautomat steht aber direkt hinter der Kasse und die Tassen auch), wird es bizarr. Aber das absolute Highlight war, dass dann nochmals einer aus dem Büro geschlendert kam, gemütlich was trank, wieder verschwand und erst nach 15 Minuten der Kundin ein Espresso gebracht wurde. Durch den Bürofritzen. Soviel zum Staff(-ing) und der "Freundlichkeit". Da wusste ich bereits, ich war hier falsch. Wusste aber noch nicht wie falsch.

Denn dann kam der krönender Abschluss: Mein Burger sah super aus, war überteuert, Fritten waren kalt und der Burger schmeckte einfach nur, sorry geht nicht anders, SCHEISSE (Pulled Pork pökelt, ist ungewürzt und wässrig wahrscheinlich weil gefroren und halt aufgetaut / Sauce gesucht und nicht gefunden / Brötchen war gut / Rest geschmacklos).

Deshalb mein Resumé: Show&Shine, aber keine Leistung......

Ach ja; dass man nicht noch selber abwaschen muss, ist schon ein Wunder bei 25Fr.- Burger/Pommes mit Eistee.

(Translated by Google) Berry Mix Ice Tea delicious if you like fruity sweets you have to try it. The burgers are very tasty as you would expect from Butcher.
Dessert Deliciously reminiscent of Burger King's Hot Brownie condition very friendly.

(Original)
Berry Mix Ice Tea sehr lecker wer auf Fruchtig Süss steht, muss es probieren. Die Burger sind wie man es nicht anders von Butcher kennt sehr Lecker.
Dessert Sehr lecker errinert einwenig wie Burger Kings Hot Brownie bedingung sehr freundlich.

(Translated by Google) I tried the Randen burger with hemp seed. In addition fries with truffle mayo. The burger was good, for me the patty could be a bit more compact. This fell apart too much and made the food a bit awkward. Very good taste. The fries were fine and the truffle mayo too. The staff welcomed us friendly. Not on the cheap side, but quite acceptable.

(Original)
Habe den Randen-Burger mit Hanfsamen probiert. Dazu Pommes mit Trüffelmayo. Der Burger war gut, für mich könnte der Patty etwas kompakter sein. Dieser fiel zu sehr auseinander und machte das Essen etwas umständlich. Geschmacklich ganz gut. Die Pommes waren fein und die Trüffelmayo ebenfalls. Das Personal hat uns freundlich empfangen. Nicht auf der günstigen Seite, aber durchaus akzeptabel.

(Translated by Google) We ordered three burgers from eats. Unfortunately, all burgers were inedible.
Since we have always been satisfied with the Butcher burger (and delivery via eats), we wanted to inform the Butcher team at Heinrichstrasse directly about the failed burger.

The responsible employee - Mr. Meier - first understood the failed burgers .. until I mentioned that I ordered the burgers through eats.
According to him, there is nothing they can do about customer complaints about eats. Had I ordered directly from butcher, we might have received new burgers.

Despite repeated explanations that the problem is not the delivery but their burgers, I ended the call after 8 unsuccessful minutes.

(Original)
Wir haben drei Burger über uber eats bestellt. Leider waren alle Burger ungeniessbar.
Da wir bisher immer zufrieden mit den Butcher-Burger (und der Auslieferung über uber eats) waren, wollten wir das Butcher-Team an Heinrichstrasse direkt über die misslungenen Burger informieren.

Der zuständige Mitarbeiter - Herr Meier -  hatte für die misslungenen Burger zuerst verständnis..bis ich erwähnte, dass ich die Burger über uber eats bestellt habe.
Gemäss seiner Aussage, können sie bei Kundenreklamationen über uber eats nichts machen..hätte ich direkt über butcher bestellt, hätten wir eventuell neue Burger erhalten..

Trotz mehrmaliger Erläuterung, dass nicht die Lieferung sondern ihre Burger das Problem sind, habe ich nach 8 erfolglosen Minuten das Telefonat beendet.

(Translated by Google) I placed an order with The Butcher via mosis.ch last week. And unfortunately both of us were not at all satisfied with the burgers. The pattys were raw and even cold inside !! This was the case with both burgers! I think that if a restaurant only offers one (here now burgers), the product has to be right!
At the moment there is no way to go to the restaurant itself, so a good take-away must be guaranteed!

(Original)
Habe letzte Woche eine Bestellung bei The Butcher über mosis.ch gemacht. Und leider waren wir beide überhaupt nicht zufrieden mit den Burgern. Die pattys waren roh und innen sogar noch kalt!! Dies war bei beiden Burgern der Fall! Ich finde, dass wenn ein Restaurant nur eines anbietet (hier jetzt Burger), muss das Produkt auf den Punkt stimmen!
Im Moment hat man keine Möglichkeit in das Restaurant selbst zu gehen, damit muss ein gutes Take-Away gewährleistet sein!

(Translated by Google) Room with industrial style decoration, clean and modern. The menu is not very extensive, they offer about 6 types of hamburgers and 3 salads. I ordered the Pulled Pork BBQ and it is good, although it is nothing special. Normal value for money for Zurich.

(Original)
Sitio con decoración estilo industrial, limpio y moderno. La carta no es muy amplia, ofrecen unos 6 tipos de hamburguesas y 3 ensaladas Yo pedí la Pulled Pork BBQ y está bien, aunque no es nada especial. Relación calidad-precio normal para Zúrich.

(Translated by Google) Nice little burger restaurant. The service was friendly, the menu clearly arranged and the prices I found to be okay / fair. The ordered bacon & cheese burger with fries was really delicious and good quality. During our visit, however, I had the feeling that the service was a bit understaffed. This also because a larger group, in addition to the many other guests was present. For the bill, we had to wait a bit long.

(Original)
Schönes kleines Burger-Lokal. Die Bedienung war freundlich, die Speisekarte übersichtlich und die Preise empfand ich als okay/fair. Der bestellte Bacon & Cheese Burger mit Fries war wirklich lecker und von guter Qualität. Bei unserem Besuch hatte ich jedoch das Gefühl, dass die Bedienung etwas unterbesetzt war. Dies auch deshalb, da auch eine grössere Gruppe, neben den schon doch vielen anderen Gästen anwesend war. Für das bezahlen der Rechnung, mussten wir doch etwas lange warten.
